title: Donald Trump: 'Hillary Clinton Has Got to go to Jail,' 'Guilty as Hell'
title_page: Donald Trump: 'Hillary Clinton Has Got to go to Jail,' 'Guilty as Hell' | Breitbart
text:
Presumptive Republican nominee Donald Trump demands that likely Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton go to jail and suggested that if he is president, the attorney general will investigate Clinton.
“I will say this, Hillary Clinton has got to go to jail,” Trump told his supporters at a campaign rally in San Jose, California, referencing Clinton’s email scandal where she used a private server while secretary of state. “Folks, honestly, she’s guilty as hell.”
Trump suggested that if he is president his attorney general would seek justice and investigate Clinton.
“Five years’ statute of limitations, if I win. Everything is going to be fair but I’m sure the attorney general will take a very good look at it,” Trump told his supporters.
